resources.string: Barman, two glasses of water, please.
These animals can drink salty water
It is considered that this animals have appeared 70 million years ago, even living at the time of dinosaurs.
These animals have 36 teeth which by an old age drop out.
Some of these animals live on Galapagos Islands.
These animals build nests, but only of pieces of rocks, a moss and wooden chips.
The strongest and dangerous poisons, for example, arsenic, don\'t influence these animals.
And they lived happily ever after
Scientists have proved that married couples of these animals don\'t part to 16 years
Communication of these animals occurs by means of a whistle.
Body temperature of these animals is about 2 degrees Celsius.
These animals on average pass for day of 2000 meters.
One of the most famous programmers was bitten once by such animal, and it became very influential event.
These animals became the cause of the incident connected with McDonald\'s in 2006.
These animals generally live there where were born.
You know more about penguins, than about hedgehogs and therefore penguins have chosen you as the king!
You know more about hedgehogs, than about penguins and therefore hedgehogs have chosen you as the king!
Penguins and hedgehogs love you because you know everything about them, now you are their king!
